document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Swords in northeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Street of Swords
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Swords''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Street of Swords was located in northeast Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. Originating along [[Border Street]] at the outer wall of the city, the Street of Swords passed southwest for several blocks until terminating at the barrier to the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. The Street of Swords was intersected by [[Beholder Street]] and [[Black Street]].
